pages.text: The Strawberry Shortcake Strain$(br2)Base THC: ??% $(br)Base CBD: ??% $(br)Effect: ??
Strawberry Shortcake Weed can be obtained by grinding your Fresh or Dried buds in a Grinder machine or using the manual grinder.
Strawberry Shortcake Seeds can be planted on farmland or inside the Grow Pot
Strawberry Shortcake Extract can be gained through the DNA Process or by extracting Strawberry Shortcake Weed in an Extractor
You can package your strawberry shortcake weed for easier distribution or selling to the stoner villager.
